articles.title: US CDC advisers back Moderna, J&J COVID-19 vaccine boosters, mix-and-match shots - CNA
articles.description: A panel of advisers to the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) on Thursday (Oct 21) unanimously backed COVID-19 vaccine boosters for recipients of the Moderna and Johnson & Johnson shots, and said Americans
articles.content:
ACIP voted to recommend booster doses for everyone 18 and older who received a first dose of Johnson & Johnson's vaccine at least two months earlier.

articles.title: Healthwatch 16: Breast cancer screening - WNEP
articles.description: October is Breast Cancer Awareness Month and the American Cancer Society estimates that the pandemic caused a drop in screenings.

articles.title: Rugby: The harsh reality of the All Blacks and World Rugby's North American conquest - New Zealand Herald
articles.description: The All Blacks last played USA in 2014. Seven years later, the sport has gone backwards.
articles.content:
All Blacks hailed as 'world rugby's most famous club' by Congressman Alex Mooney. Video / @RepAlexMooney via TwitterBy Joe Porter of RNZ

articles.title: Restricting travel over vaccine type could be discrimination, PAHO warns - TODAY
articles.description: MEXICO CITY -     Countries should grant entry to vaccinated travelers regardless of which shot they received to prevent discrimination and facilitate business, a top official of the Pan American Health Organization (PAHO) said on Wednesday.

articles.author: Chidanand Rajghatta
articles.title: China an aggressor against India and other neighbors, says US envoy-nominee to Beijing - Times of India
